question: Which Union Ministry has released the report of a survey titled ‘Health in India’?
option1: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
option2: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation
option3: Ministry of Environment Forests and Climate Change
answer: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation
explanation:
The Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation has released the report of a survey titled ‘Health in India’.
The report is based on information collected through NSS Schedule 25.0 (Household Social Consumption: Health). As per the report, the Zoroastrian community is the most susceptible to ailments.
